name: Trail Mix
description:
You take on the role of a 'blushie' that traverses through different areas to get to the end. But there's a catch, you must make the path to get there.  Will you be able to reach the end unscathed and acquire the fabled item?

Finn Morrison - Lead Programmer / Lead Designer / UX Designer

Marla De Leon - Lead Artist / Level Designer / UI Designer

Emersen Lorenz - Sound and Music Producer / Assistant Programmer / Level Designer

Aubrey Schelbauer - Supporting Artist / Level Designer / UI Designer
